author: rjected
content: In the `Request Blob Pooled Transactions` test, it looks like the expected length is the length _without_ the rlp header, I thought it would be defined as the length of the network encoding

author: rjected
content: If this is supposed to be correct then there definitely needs to be more specification in eth/68

author: rjected
content:
> sizes (as defined in EIP-2718)
because this doesn't really specify whether it should be `len(type || tx body)` or `len(rlp string header || type || tx body)`

author: .fjl
content: it should be the length of the 'consensus encoding' of transactions (i.e. the bytes without rlp header)
